summary: Completed comprehensive testing of French text-to-speech application. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend fully functional with French interface, voice selection, speed control, audio generation, and history management. OpenAI TTS integration working correctly with natural punctuation understanding.

performance_notes.note: Audio generation takes 15-30 seconds for longer texts - this is normal for OpenAI TTS processing
performance_notes.impact: User experience - loading time expected for AI processing

performance_notes.note: Generation time varies with text length (15-30s for complex texts)

passed_tests: POST /api/tts/generate - audio generation with different voices and speeds
Text input with character counter (4000 char limit)
Voice selection (alloy, echo, fable, onyx, nova, shimmer)
Punctuation understanding test with French text
UI design verification (ocean blue/mint green theme, Space Grotesk font)
